name: Story 1: Honey
description:
The first part of the self-imposed challenge I gave myself to write 6 short games a day.

In the first challenge, I only do twine games, but I can see myself upping the anty with unity or another type of platform game for the next month's challenge. If I fail, I lower the expectations then.

Pitch:

There is a beautiful woman in your kitchen and for once, you wish she would stay.

Recommended music for this game: "I'm always gonna love you" from the Muppet takes Manhattan movie.

Picture: Alive but dead, by Peter Callesen, 2006.
